description:
Note: **This is an add-on for the Paid version of Quick-Keys Keyboard, it will do nothing if you don't have the paid version of the app installed**

This application allows you to launch the Quick-Keys Keyboard application directly enabling the keyboard in the notification area without the need of opening the app and turning the keyboard on. 

OR

This QK Launcher App also allows you to launch/enable the keyboard while using other third party app launcher applications by using the app id below:

com.gardnertech.qklaunch


The app id above is used for third party launching applications that are able to launch specific apps by their application id. 

Note: **This is an add-on for the Paid version of Quick-Keys Keyboard, it will do nothing if you don't have the paid version of the app installed**


It will quickly open and close two apps and then the Quick-Keys Keyboard will be enabled and available in the notification area.




You must have the paid version of Quick-Keys Keyboard installed for this app to work. 

& Thank you for looking at my app
